page.title: 09Entertainment & Recreation 1
page.content: The Wheelwright Arms Public House is the only public place of entertainment in the map reference area. Darts and Cribbage groups are based here and the Wheelwright Handbell Ringers, who perform at local events, were formed here. Recreation and entertainment is organised almost exclusively by those living in the area and centres in Pencombe Parish Hall. The Pencombe Fete Committee meet regularly to arrange events including the Fete, Quizzes, Rounders Matches and Skittles evenings. Occasionally concerts are held in St.John's church. Various country hobbies are enjoyed such as shooting, gardening, walking, cycling and horse riding. Recently a Chess Club has been formed by a local man in the area. The North Hereford Hunt meet occasionally at The Wheelwright Arms.
